BlogPost.title: BlogPost
BlogPost.description: Represents a blog post with its content, metadata, and relationships.

id.description: Unique identifier for the blog post. (Primary Key)

slug.description: Slug for the blog post, used in the URL.

author.description: Name of the author of the blog post.

content.description: The main content of the blog post, likely stored as HTML or Markdown.

coverImage.description: URL or path to the cover image for the blog post.

date.description: Date and time when the blog post was published.

tags.description: Tags associated with the blog post.

excerpt.description: A short excerpt of the blog post.

coverImageHint.description: A hint for AI to find a relevant cover image.

definition.description: Stores blog post data. The document ID serves as the blogId.

params.name: blogId
params.description: Unique identifier for the blog post.
